socatgen.sh
Go to the documentation of this file.
1#!/bin/sh
2
3# This script generates a C header file from the socat binary
4# If socat.h already exists, it will not be generated again
5# If socat.h does not exist:
6# - it will download the socat binary from github.com/ernw/static-toolbox
7# - then hexdump the binary to socat.h
8
9generate_socat_h() {
10 # if socat file do not exist, download it
11 if [ ! -f socat ]; then
12 echo "socat binary not found."
13 echo "Download static socat binary from github.com/ernw/static-toolbox"
14 wget https://github.com/ernw/static-toolbox/releases/download/socat-v1.7.4.4/socat-1.7.4.4-x86_64 -O socat
15 if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
16 echo "Failed to download socat binary."
17 exit 1
18 fi
19 echo "Download complete."
20 fi
21 echo "Hexdumping socat to socat.h"
22 xxd -i socat > include/socat.h
23}
24
25# Check if socat.h exists
26if [ ! -f ./include/socat.h ]; then
27 echo "socat.h not found, generating it..."
28 generate_socat_h
29else
30 echo "socat.h already exists, skipping generation."
31fi
